Text.Name: 02_TablesAndWorksheets\WorksheetNotes\_Text
Text.SourceText:
### Worksheet Notes
To every worksheet belongs notes text. You can view and edit the notes text.
To do this, make the worksheet the current document. Then make sure, that the Notes tool window is shown. If it is not shown, make it visible by choosing View→Notes from the main menu or pressing CTRL+ALT+N at the keyboard. You can then visit, add or edit the text in the notes window.
Some operations, for instance importing ASCII text into a worksheet, will add some information to the notes text automatically.
